Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents an AI system project for compliance tracking.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer associated with the project.

useCase.description: The use case for the AI system.

systemType.description: The type of the AI system.

riskCategory.description: The risk category of the project.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the project was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the project was last updated.

businessContext.description: The business context of the project.

intendedUsers.description: The intended users of the AI system.

geographicScope.description: The geographic scope of the project.

legalRequirements.description: Legal requirements such as GDPR, MDR, AI Act, etc.

dataCategories.description: Categories of data used by the system.

dataSources.description: Sources of the data used by the system.

lifecycleModel.description: The lifecycle model used for the project.

notes.description: Notes related to the project lifecycle.

lastReview.description: The timestamp of the last review.

functionalRequirements.description: Functional requirements for the AI system.

nonFunctionalRequirements.description: Non-functional requirements for the AI system.

designChoices.description: Design choices such as model selections, guardrails, and prompts.

architectureSummary.description: A summary of the system's architecture.

dataArchitecture.description: The architecture of the data processing and storage.

performanceObjectives.description: The performance objectives for the AI system.

explainabilityStrategy.description: The strategy for ensuring explainability of the AI system.

RiskRegisterEntry.title: Risk Register Entry
RiskRegisterEntry.description: An entry in the risk register for a project.

impact.description: Impact of the risk if it occurs.

Document.title: Document
Document.description: A document associated with a project.

uploadedAt.description: The timestamp when the document was uploaded.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores individual AI project compliance data.

/projects/{projectId}/riskRegister/{risk.description: Subcollection for the risk register of a specific project.

/projects/{projectId}/documents/{documen.description: Subcollection for documents related to a specific project.
